document.full_text: general motors co  will revamp a kentucky factory to produce a new version of the iconic chevrolet corvette sports car that will look "completely different" from the current version, the automaker said on wednesday.
document.title: gm to invest $131 million at kentucky corvette plant
lines_and_colors: general motors co  will revamp a kentucky factory to produce a new version of the iconic chevrolet corvette sports car that will look "completely different" from the current version, the automaker said on wednesday.
